name: How To War
description:
My first ludum dare submission!

The factories you build are required to win the war. However, they produce pollution, and too much of it can cause problems. Keep it down with greeneries, and win the war!

Made for ludum dare compo in 48 hours.

After a lot of thinking and experimenting, I decided that it's best if it stays as it was for ludum dare. Mostly because I want it to stay like that, and because there wasn't really a lot to expand on.

For ratings on ludum dare page, please use the ludum dare version! :)

Changes in patches/updates:

v1.01:

  •  Added hotkeys: 1-factory, 2-greenery
  •  Added a new smoke graphic
  •  Fixed a bug I discovered: before when you pressed on try again/new game it would load again, but nothing would work.
